title: Zenith - LVMH
text: IdentityZENITH Founded in 1865 in Le Locle, Switzerland, ZENITH has been synonymous with the avant-garde of watchmaking for over 160 years, driven by a pioneering spirit and an unwavering quest for precision. As the first fully integrated watch manufacture, the Maison has continually pushed the boundaries of its craft by developing its own movements, including the legendary El Primero, the world’s first automatic chronograph, first unveiled in 1969.Each ZENITH collection reflects the brand’s commitment to innovation and artisanal excellence. The CHRONOMASTER line showcases ZENITH’s mastery of high-precision chronographs; DEFY embodies the technological avant-garde with bold designs; and the PILOT collection celebrates the Maison’s aviation heritage with timepieces designed for adventure.This relentless pursuit of perfection has earned ZENITH a record 2,333 chronometry prizes, a testament to its exceptional expertise. Among these accolades, the majority were awarded to the Calibre 135, an iconic movement from the golden age of chronometry, now reborn in an exciting new iteration within ZENITH’s recently introduced G.F.J. collection. For over 160 years, ZENITH has embodied the art of exceptional watchmaking, driven by a history rich in technical innovation and remarkable performance. Thanks to the unique expertise of its master watchmakers, the company has established itself as a benchmark in high-frequency watchmaking, with over 2,333 chronometry awards to its name.
